message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll still give you a good deal!
You can't do better than this, take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still willing to make a deal!
I'm not getting desperate, but I'm getting serious. This is my best offer so far!
I'm not giving you 90% of the money, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Take it or leave it!
You're getting close to walking away with nothing, don't make me do that!
This is my last offer. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing!
You're really going to let it slip away? I'm making one final offer!
This is my absolute final offer. Take it, or we both lose everything!
Fine, you want to play it this way? I'll take the last 100 dollars and leave you with nothing!
